responsibilities: Lead Projects: Plan, schedule, and deliver software projects on time and at the highest quality.
Build Teams: Manage and mentor developers, fostering collaboration and high performance.
Drive Strategy: Make key decisions on backend architecture, scalability, and infrastructure.
Collaborate Cross-Functionally: Align software, product, engineering, and department goals for seamless execution.
Optimize Processes: Streamline workflows, solve technical challenges, and improve productivity.
Oversee Deployments: Ensure smooth, efficient deployments and system performance.
skills: Proficient in TypeScript and Golang, with extensive testing experience (unit, end-to-end, and load testing using Cypress, Playwright, k6).
Skilled in containerization (Docker, Kubernetes) and DevOps practices, including CI/CD pipelines, infrastructure as code (IaC), and system monitoring (Datadog, Grafana).

Experienced in developing and optimizing LLM applications, including Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG) and GPT-based solutions, with strong knowledge of deployment patterns, prompt engineering, and API integration (OpenAI, Anthropic, Gemini).
Proficient in ML frameworks (PyTorch), optimization techniques (quantization, model distillation), and vector databases (pgvector, Weaviate, Pinecone).
Experienced with LLM inference stacks (TensorRT-LLM, VLLM, llama.cpp) and developing RAG systems.
Strong problem-solving and analytical skills, with excellent communication to foster cross-functional collaboration and stakeholder alignment.
qualifications: 8+ years in backend development specializing in scalable system design, API architecture (DDD), and microservices (gRPC, REST), with expertise in databases (Postgres, MongoDB, Redis, Clickhouse) and cloud infrastructure (AWS).
Proven ability to hire, mentor, and lead high-performing technical teams while setting technical direction and delivering impactful backend projects.
Strong track record of leading full development lifecycles, managing issue tracking (Linear), and delivering complex backend systems on time.
Experience in startups or high-growth environments, with deep expertise in system optimization tools and processes.
Bachelor's degree in Computer Science or Engineering.
